alert.note: Alert for South End of the Upper Sierra; Yosemite Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 11:58AM PST until February 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Yosemite Valley and South End of the Upper Sierra. * WHEN...From 7 PM Saturday to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South End of the Upper Sierra; Yosemite Valley
